text:
@NYGovCuomo David Icke has been on to this One World order since the 1990s.

There is NO pandemic.  This is all smoke and mirrors for the purpose of tanking the economy and controlling the masses.  YOU don't care about the elderly.  YOU are using them.  Stop 5G radiation!!!
